question: Name two notable lakes surrounding Trakai, Lithuania.
true_answer: Galvė Lake and Lukos Lake (also known as Bernardinų Lake).
asked_question_translated: Name two notable lakes surrounding Trakai, Lithuania.
answer: Two notable lakes surrounding Trakai, Lithuania are Lake Galvė and Lake Bernardinų.
answer_translated_eng: Two notable lakes surrounding Trakai, Lithuania are Lake Galvė and Lake Bernardinų.
